author: Gino Spocchia, Gino Spocchia
title: Lawyer who live-tweeted struggle to get coronavirus test in NYC is in critical condition
description: David Law, a former federal prosecutor, is 'not doing great'
content:
A high-profile lawyer and former federal prosecutor who tweeted about his struggle to get tested for coronavirus is now in intensive care at a New York hospital.
David Lat, the 44-year-old founder of the Above the Law blog was hospitalised on 18 March after … [+1784 chars]
